mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_tel, user_email, user_address, user_detail_address, user_zipcode, user_authority, user_enabled) values (#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_password}, #{user_tel}, #{user_email}, #{user_address}, #{user_detail_address}, #{user_zipcode}, 'ROLE_USER', 1)
mapper.update: update users set user_id = #{user_id}, user_name = #{user_name}, user_tel=#{user_tel}, user_address=#{user_address}, user_detail_address=#{user_detail_address} where user_id = #{user_id}
